security: Revealing that the CIA was considering surfacing evidence to discredit Castro could compromise ongoing operations and damage the agency's reputation.
summary: A cable from the Director to Rome indicating that unauthorized sub-surfacing of information via media related to action-intended PARA 2 REF is not desired at this time, implying a desire to avoid direct or indirect overtures to local officials in connection with this action.
summary_one_paragraph: On December 17, 1963, a cable was sent from the Director to Rome, concerning action-intended PARA 2 REF. The message indicates that an unauthorized sub-surfacing of related information via media was taking place and that direct or indirect overtures to local officials were not desired at that time. The C/S comment reveals that the requested action involved considering surfacing any evidence of Castro financing terrorist and pro-Cuban acts.
title: CASA MARIVA WAVE MOON
